name: spo-bulk-creation-sharepoint-sites-csv
title: Creation of SharePoint Online sites from CSV
shortDescription: This script helps you in creation of SharePoint Communication and Team sites in bulk. It takes an input from CSV.

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample Creation of SharePoint Online sites from CSV

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
